mapper.select: SELECT city from temphotel group by city
SELECT * FROM temphotel where city LIKE CONCAT('%', #{city}, '%') or hotelname like CONCAT('%', #{city}, '%')

SELECT t.serialnumber, t.hotelname, t.address1, t.address2, t.postalcode, t.city, t.telephone, t.star, t.longitude, t.latitude, h.file_name, h.file_url, round(AVG(r.score), 1) AS score, COUNT(r.username), o.price, o.room_id, a.open_date FROM hotel_image as h full join temphotel as t on h.serialnumber = t.serialnumber full join review as r on t.serialnumber = r.serialnumber full join room as o on t.serialnumber = o.serialnumber left join room_available as a on o.room_id = a.room_id where t.city LIKE CONCAT('%', #{city}, '%') and o.room_id in( SELECT room_id FROM (SELECT room_id, MIN(open_date) as open_date, MAX(close_date) as close_date FROM ( SELECT *, ( ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY room_id ORDER BY open_date ) ) AS rownum FROM room_available WHERE open_date >= TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND close_date <= TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY room_id, open_date ) as a GROUP BY room_id, (open_date - cast(a.rownum as integer)), (close_date - cast(a.rownum as integer)) ORDER BY room_id, Min(open_date), MAX(close_date) ) as b WHERE open_date = TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYYMMDD') and close_date = TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYYMMDD')
) and open_date = TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYYMMDD') group by t.serialnumber, h.file_name, h.file_url, o.room_id, a.open_date

SELECT room_id FROM (SELECT room_id, MIN(open_date) as open_date, MAX(close_date) as close_date FROM ( SELECT *, ( ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY room_id ORDER BY open_date ) ) AS rownum FROM room_available WHERE open_date >= TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND close_date <= TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY room_id, open_date ) as a GROUP BY room_id, (open_date - cast(a.rownum as integer)), (close_date - cast(a.rownum as integer)) ORDER BY room_id, Min(open_date), MAX(close_date) ) as b WHERE open_date = TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYYMMDD') and close_date = TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYYMMDD')

select t.serialnumber, t.hotelname , t.address1, t.address2, t.postalcode, t.city,
t.telephone, t.star, t.longitude, t.latitude, h.file_name, h.file_url, round(avg(r.score), 1) as score, count(r.username),
o.price, o.room_id, a.open_date
from hotel_image as h
full join temphotel as t
on h.serialnumber = t.serialnumber
full join review as r
on t.serialnumber = r.serialnumber
full join hotel_service as s
on t.serialnumber = s.serialnumber
full join room as o
on t.serialnumber = o.serialnumber
left join room_available as a
on o.room_id = a.room_id
where latitude >= #{wLatitude} and latitude <= #{eLatitude} and longitude >= #{sLongitude} and longitude <= #{nLongitude}
and o.room_id in (
#{room_id}
) and open_date = TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYYMMDD')
group by t.serialnumber, h.file_name, h.file_url, o.room_id, a.open_date

select t.serialnumber, t.hotelname , t.address1, t.address2, t.postalcode, t.city,
t.telephone, t.star, t.longitude, t.latitude, h.file_name, h.file_url, round(avg(r.score), 1) as score, count(r.username),
o.price, o.room_id, a.open_date
from hotel_image as h
full join temphotel as t
on h.serialnumber = t.serialnumber
full join review as r
on t.serialnumber = r.serialnumber
full join room as o
on t.serialnumber = o.serialnumber
left join room_available as a
on o.room_id = a.room_id
where t.city LIKE CONCAT('%', #{city}, '%')
group by t.serialnumber, h.file_name, h.file_url, o.room_id, a.open_date
SELECT hotel.city, count(*), city.file_url FROM temphotel AS hotel LEFT JOIN city AS city ON hotel.city = city.city GROUP BY hotel.city, city.file_url ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT r.serialnumber, r.hotelname, t.city, t.star, hi.file_url, count(*) FROM reservation AS r LEFT JOIN temphotel AS t ON r.serialnumber = t.serialnumber LEFT JOIN hotel_image AS hi ON r.serialnumber = hi.serialnumber GROUP BY r.serialnumber, r.hotelname, t.city, t.star, hi.file_url LIMIT 6
SELECT hotel.city, count(*) FROM temphotel AS hotel LEFT JOIN city AS city ON hotel.city = city.city GROUP BY hotel.city, city.file_url ORDER BY count DESC
SELECT * FROM temphotel AS th LEFT JOIN hotel_image AS hi ON th.serialnumber = hi.serialnumber ORDER BY random() LIMIT 5
